document_data.name: Garret Velryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Garret Velryn''' was a wilderness guide who lived in the [[Ten Towns]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a skilled outdoorsman who felt more comfortable in the wilderness than in the city.
document_data.Relationships: He was married to a man named [[Keegan Velryn|Keegan]], with whom he shared a home in [[Targos]].
document_data.History:
Garret grew up in a wealthy family that lived in [[Neverwinter]]. He did not care much for city life, and traveled north to [[Icewind Dale]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1489}}, Garret was hired by a group of [[adventurer]]s to lead an expedition up to [[Kelvin's Cairn]]. He met up with the party at [[Caer-Konig]], and helped them buy the supplies they would need at [[Frozenfar Expeditions]]. Among the group were the [[goliath]] [[Mokingo Growling Bear Akannathi|Mokingo Akannathi]], a [[Yondalla]]n [[halfling]] named [[Perilou Fishfinger]], and a foul-mouthed [[tiefling]] called [[Astrix]].

While they were traversing the mountain side, the group was attacked by a [[yeti]] and seperated from one another.

A few days later, his husband Keegan hired some adventurers to find Garret's whereabouts.
